numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a pattern in many sports.
2. In all sports except Major League Baseball, most players are players of color.
3. In basketball, most players are people of color.
4. In basketball, the ratio of players of color to white players is about 4 to 1 for women and for men.
5. In Major League Baseball, the players are almost equally divided between people of color and white people.
6. In Major League Baseball, the ratio of white players to players of color is about 3 to 2.
7. In every poll, the percentage of head coaches of color is much lower than the percentage of players of color.
8. In the National Football League, 74% of players are people of color.
9. In the National Football League, 13% of head coaches are people of color.
10. I wonder why this difference exists.
11. In Major League Baseball, the percentage of head coaches of color is 20 percentage points lower than the percentage of players of color.
12. In Major League Soccer, the percentage of head coaches of color is 20 percentage points lower than the percentage of players of color.
13. This difference is smaller than the difference in the National Football League.
14. In the Women's National Basketball Association, the percentage difference between coaches of color and players of color is about 50 percentage points.
15. In the Men's National Basketball Association, the percentage difference between coaches of color and players of color is about 50 percentage points.
16. People of color are less likely to be a head coach in a major sports league than white people.
17. This situation impacts the community around us.
18. This situation shows that people of color have different opportunities to be in power than white people.
19. The headline is: Player of Colors vs. Head Coaches of Color in different major sports leagues.
